title: Asian Chicken Noodle Soup
directions: In a large pot over medium heat, heat coconut oil. Add onion, bell pepper, and carrots and cook until tender, 6 to 8 minutes. Add garlic and stir until fragrant, 1 minute. Add curry powder and cayenne and season with salt. Stir until combined.
Pour over coconut milk and chicken broth and bring to a simmer. Add shredded chicken, cilantro, and ramen noodles and cook until noodles are al dente.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with lime.
ingredients: 1 large carrot, cut into thin 2"-long pieces
1/3 c. chopped fresh cilantro, plus more for garnish
1 package ramen noodles, seasoning packet discarded
